snippet: The National Transportation Safety Board ruled Tuesday that the Federal Aviation Administration has the authority to apply to unmanned aircraft its longstanding rules against “reckless or careless use” of aircraft.
abstract: National Transportation Safety Board rules that Federal Aviation Administration has authority to apply restrictions against 'reckless or careless use' of aircraft to unmanned drones.
lead_paragraph: The National Transportation Safety Board ruled Tuesday that the Federal Aviation Administration has the authority to apply to unmanned aircraft its longstanding rules against “reckless or careless use” of aircraft.

headline.main: Washington: F.A.A. Rules Found to Apply to Unmanned Aircraft
headline.print_headline: Washington: F.A.A. Rules Found to Apply to Unmanned Aircraft
